Package fi.fta.controllers

Class CategoriesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.fta.controllers.CategoryBeansController<Category,CategoryUI,CategoryManager>
      • fi.fta.controllers.CategoriesController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping("/categories")
public class CategoriesController
extends CategoryBeansController<Category,CategoryUI,CategoryManager>
    Controller for strictly for categories only available operations.
    Author:
    andrysta

                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleResult<java.util.List<Category>> getRoot​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Request method for retrieving all root categories when the user has rights.

        response - http response
        Returns:
        list of root categories in wrapper objects

      • getReadableTree

        @RequestMapping(value="/readable-tree",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleResult<java.util.List<TreeBranchUI>> getReadableTree​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Current user specific tree of categories. The tree will be restricted to those categories only, where user has rights to read.
        Parameters:
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        list of categories wrapped in objects for JSON

      • getSummary

        @RequestMapping(value="/summary",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleResult<java.util.List<CategorySummaryUI>> getSummary​(@RequestParam(value="id",required=false)
                                                                  java.lang.Long id,
                                                                  @RequestParam(value="depth",required=false)
                                                                  java.lang.Integer depth,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Retrieve service statistics for any category (also root categories) and all subcategories. Counts statistics for top level categories, or bottom level categories, if depth is negative.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of root category (optional)
        depth - depth of categories tree path to sum up statistics (optional)
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        list of statistics of all categories and subcategories wrapped in objects for JSON

      • getSummaryExcel

        @RequestMapping(value="/summary-download",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getSummaryExcel​(@RequestParam(value="id",required=false)
                                                                  java.lang.Long id,
                                                                  @RequestParam(value="depth",required=false)
                                                                  java.lang.Integer depth,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Retrieve service statistics for root categories and all subcategories in excel file format. Counts statistics for top level categories, or bottom level categories, if depth is negative.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of root category (optional)
        depth - depth of categories tree path to sum up statistics
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        list of statistics of all categories and subcategories in excel file

      • actions

        @RequestMapping(value="/actions",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public SimpleResult<java.util.List<CategoryBeanActionUI>> actions​(@RequestBody
                                                                  CategoryBeanActionParamsUI ui,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Filters categories beans actions.
        Parameters:
        ui - categories beans actions parameters wrapper (includes user ID and dates ranges of actions)
        request - http request
        response - http response
        Returns:
        list of filtered categories beans actions
